title: Soy Vinaigrette Recipe
full_text:
Soy Vinaigrette Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
8 servings
Makes
1 cup
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
tablespoons
sherry vinegar
2
tablespoons
white vinegar
1
tablespoon
soy sauce
4
teaspoons
Dijon mustard
1/2
cup
canola oil
1
small
shallot
, finely minced (about
1
tablespoon
)
1
clove
garlic
, microplaned (about
1
teaspoon
)
1/4
cup
extra-virgin olive oil
1/2
teaspoon
salt
1/4
teaspoon
freshly
ground black pepper
Directions
Combine all ingredients in small container or squeeze bottle. Seal container and shake vigorously until emulsified. Shake again before each use.
